description: '''Blutengel''' (stylized '''BlutEngel'''; German for "Blood Angel") is a German [[electronic music]] group formed by singer Chris Pohl (also of the groups [[Terminal Choice]], Tumor and [[Miss Construction]] and the owner of the Fear Section label) after leaving [[Seelenkrank]]. The lyrics are written primarily in German and English and are presented with male and female vocals. The themes of the songs usually centre around themes common in [[Gothic fiction]] such as love, [[vampirism]], sexual fetishism, death and [[immortality]]. The band calls their musical style "[[dark pop]]".
